notes.title: Albert Einstein
notes.body: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.

notes.title: Sun Tzu
notes.body: To achieve one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the height of skill. The height of skill is to defeat the enemy without fighting.

notes.title: React course
notes.body:
1. do the task
2. fix the bugs
3. test the app
